alert.note: Alert for Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 05 at 1:44AM MST until January 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Stanley County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon CST /11 AM MST/ today to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
